00062 namespace indri {
00063   namespace index {
00064     class BagList : public ::TermInfoList {
00065     private:
00066       class TermListBuilder* _list;
00067       std::vector< std::pair<int, int> > _termCounts;
00068       TermInfo _info;
00069       int _position;
00070 
00071     public:
00072       BagList( class TermListBuilder *list ) ;
00073       
00074       ~BagList() ;
00075 
00076       void startIteration() const ;
00077       bool hasMore() const ;
00078       TermInfo* nextEntry() const ;
00079 
00080       // Note: even though we have position information here, I'm not returning it
00081       //       if you really really want it, put in a feature request or something
00082       TermInfo* getElement( TermInfo* elem, POS_T position ) const ;
00083 
00084       POS_T beginPosition() const ;
00085 
00086       POS_T endPosition() const ;
00087 
00088       POS_T nextPosition( POS_T position ) const ;
00089     };
00090 
00091     class PositionInfo : public ::TermInfo {
00092     private:
00093       int _position;
00094 
00095     public:
00096       void position( int p ) {
00097         _position = p;
00098       }
00099 
00100       int position() {
00101         return _position;
00102       }
00103     };
00104 
00105     class PositionList : public ::TermInfoList {
00106     private:
00107       class TermListBuilder* _list;
00108       PositionInfo _info;
00109       int _position;
00110       
00111     public:
00112       PositionList( class TermListBuilder* list ) ;
00113       ~PositionList() ;
00114       
00115       TermInfo* newElement() ;
00116 
00117       void assignElement( TermInfo* to, TermInfo* from ) ;
00118 
00119       TermInfo* getElement( TermInfo* elem, POS_T position ) const ;
00120 
00121       POS_T beginPosition() const ;
00122 
00123       POS_T endPosition() const ;
00124 
00125       POS_T nextPosition( POS_T position ) const ;
00126 
00127       void startIteration() const ;
00128 
00129       bool hasMore() const ;
00130 
00131       TermInfo* nextEntry() const ;
00132     };
00133   };
